note: Hacker, Maker, Blogger, Developer, Teacher, Public Interest Technologist @DataMeet & CTO @Peppo. I blog at ThejeshGN.com and this is my social microblog. Everything is Personal. Bangalore/India. +05:30, IST. He/His. Email.

content.html: A world where computers write and make art while human beings break their backs cleaning up toxic messes is the exact opposite of the world I thought I was signing up for when I got into programming
content.value: A world where computers write and make art while human beings break their backs cleaning up toxic messes is the exact opposite of the world I thought I was signing up for when I got into programming

content.html:
Face Masks

I don't know about the world(?) but face masks will never go out of fashion in India, they are going to stay and stay for long time.

See the amount of dust and air pollution in India. If you use public transport like bus or auto or walk, then how can you not use mask?

content.html:
Today I learned that https://mathstodon.xyz is an instance that supports LaTeX.

Back in 2009 Michael Nielsen introduced me to the wonderful Polymath project, https://blog.jonudell.net/2009/07/31/polymath-equals-user-innovatio/, which emerged from a similar tweak to WordPress.

I'm no mathematician but I am intensely interested in how adding such affordances enables people to work better together. If there's a good overview of how math discourse is happening on that instance I'd love to read it.

#math #maths #til
content.value: Today I learned that https://mathstodon.xyz is an instance that supports LaTeX. Back in 2009 Michael Nielsen introduced me to the wonderful Polymath project, https://blog.jonudell.net/2009/07/31/polymath-equals-user-innovatio/, which emerged from a similar tweak to WordPress. I'm no mathematician but I am intensely interested in how adding such affordances enables people to work better together. If there's a good overview of how math discourse is happening on that instance I'd love to read it.#math #maths #til

content.html: Women sue Twitter, claiming Musk layoffs unfairly targeted female staff https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2022/dec/08/twitter-sued-firing-female-workers-after-musk-buyout The proposed class-action lawsuit alleges that after the takeover, 57% of women were laid off compared with 47% of men. #laborights #socialmedia #discrimination

content.html:
Hi all! We've been asked a few times recently why GoToSocial's storage directory takes up so much space (like, over 5gb in some cases).

The short answer is: we don't uncache avatars and headers yet. So for every account your instance sees--and it will see a lot!--it will store the avatar and header of that account perpetually.

We've got something in the works for cleaning up old avatars and headers in the same way that we currently clean up status media attachments. This should be included in 0.7.0 which we'll release some time after the new year :) So hang in there!

(In the meantime, please resist the urge the delete things from your storage directory manually. It will cause error messages and missing media.)
content.value: Hi all! We've been asked a few times recently why GoToSocial's storage directory takes up so much space (like, over 5gb in some cases).The short answer is: we don't uncache avatars and headers yet. So for every account your instance sees--and it will see a lot!--it will store the avatar and header of that account perpetually.We've got something in the works for cleaning up old avatars and headers in the same way that we currently clean up status media attachments. This should be included in 0.7.0 which we'll release some time after the new year :) So hang in there!(In the meantime, please resist the urge the delete things from your storage directory manually. It will cause error messages and missing media.)

content.html:
microblog.pub : Where do my Followers and Following come from?

I run the microblog.pub as my ActivityPub server. Since I had almost reached 100+ followers and following, I was curious about the diversity or spread of instances. So I wrote some SQL queries to explore the downloaded SQLite.

https://thejeshgn.com/2022/12/10/microblog-pub-where-do-my-followers-and-following-come-from/
content.value:

content.html:
Earlier this year, I became aware of STANDARD EBOOKS, a donation-dependent group of edtiors and layout experts who have been doing the amazing work of taking out-of-copyright books, turning them into top-quality ebooks, and then releasing them for free.

Some of the books they've done are in the Internet Archive here:

https://archive.org/details/standardebooks

They're seeking 75 patrons in December to keep themselves afloat, consider donating to this amazing cause.

https://standardebooks.org/ebooks
content.value: Earlier this year, I became aware of STANDARD EBOOKS, a donation-dependent group of edtiors and layout experts who have been doing the amazing work of taking out-of-copyright books, turning them into top-quality ebooks, and then releasing them for free.Some of the books they've done are in the Internet Archive here:https://archive.org/details/standardebooksThey're seeking 75 patrons in December to keep themselves afloat, consider donating to this amazing cause.https://standardebooks.org/ebooks

content.html:
Shared by my Daughter
"I need privacy, not because my actions are questionable, but because your judgement and intentions are"

In response to "if you have nothing to hide you have nothing to fear"

content.html:
The Fediverse and Mastodon hockey stick graph continues at a linear rate. It‚Äôs up to 9 million users, an increase of about 2 million from last week. Of those, 7 million of those users are on Mastodon. https://fediverse.observer/stats

#fediverse #mastodon #twittermigration #stats
